name: Pumpkin Platformer Demo
description:
Navigate through different foresty and magical worlds with moving platforms and floating rocks. Find all the campsites and light the campfires to activate the portal to enter a new world!

Controls:

'W' - Move forward

'A' & 'D' - Turn the camera left and right respectively

'S' - Hard brake

'Space' - Jump

How to play:

Navigate the world and find all of the campsites. Jump on top of the campfires to light them—light all the campfires to activate the portal. Find the portal once activated and jump through it to exit the world and enter another!zz

Made for Cozy Autumn Game Jam 2022 hosted by Firith Studio

#CozyAutumnGameJam2022

Assets used:

https://www.kenney.nl/assets/platformer-kit

https://www.kenney.nl/assets/nature-kit

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/halloween-free-pumpkin-101968
